entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is a person mentioned in the text as being attacked.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is implied to be the one who raised the alarm and found Mr. Weasley, but it is also stated that he was the one who attacked Mr. Weasley in the first place.

relationships.description: Harry Potter is described as the attacker of Mr. Weasley, but it is also stated that he raised the alarm to find him.
